name: Mary T
text:
DO NOT USE THIS PLACE!!!

Took in my Galaxy S7 Edge after I dropped it and screen turned green and flickered. Everything else was working great, including charging.

Was told it needed new screen. Paid $230 with my debit card and was then informed that there would be no warranty. Got an email receipt.

Got my phone back a few days later and it was down to 1%. So I immediately tried to charge it and got an error message that the battery temp was too low to charge.

Went in the next morning and was told it needed a new battery because old battery would not charge new LED screen (which I should have been told on first visit). Paid $60 MORE. Also told there was no tax since I paid with cash and was not offered a receipt nor one by email (like previous time).

My husband picks the phone up, tries to charge it and gets the SAME error message.

He calls them and is now told that the motherboard is probably bad and it needs a new one. NO FLIPPING WAY was I giving them another dime!!

I am out almost $300 and STILL have no phone to use!!!

They basically  just took my money and did not fix my phone.

I DO NOT recommend this place AT ALL and will be contacting BBB!

resp.text: Mam, I'm sorry that the repair did not work out to your satisfaction. We did everything in our power to help you with your phone. And provided you with every option at our disposal. And we did everything that we could over the phone to explain to you the error that your phone was still having from both me and my assistant. Unfortunately sometimes when performing a repair, be it on a car a house or an electronic device there is more wrong with it than just the issue that you drop it off for. These issues are unfortunate, nonetheless, but sometimes they are there. I apologize you're unsatisfied, and if you change your mind and decide to get the device fixed as we said on the phone, the amount that you have already paid for the battery repair will apply towards the motherboard. I hope you have a great day and if you need anything else give us a call!!

name: Kim McConnon
text: Best place around! Easy to get affordable phone repairs! Much appreciated! They are knowledgeable and make it stress free

name: Blair McAbee
text:
Although my phone was repaired, I will not recomend them. I do not trust businesses that ask for payment up front and then tell you they have a no refund policy if their service comes into question. Just because you call something a store policy, does not make it legally or morally correct.
I award this business a negative one star rating.

resp.text: Glad that your phone works! I cannot find a ticket for repair with your info on it ... Nonetheless, the business policies that we've developed over the years are a direct reflection on experiences we've had in the past. And I assure you in this industry they are very commonplace. The parts that we use do carry a warranty. Again glad to hear that your phone's doing well, you need anything please let us know!

name: Jamaka Jenkins
text: Best prices in town.  Love them

name: Salissa Bias
text: Great service they were really nice And great price to get my screen fixed all over great experience 10/10 wil go there again if I have any issues

name: Mark Wright
text: Very pleased with screen repair... Was concerned after having to pay total up-front and not receiving a printed reciept or anything in hand to show I had a phone under repair... I felt it was pricey,  but the job was great... 👍🏾

name: Marilyn Burson
text: I was pleased with the results of their service but was uncomfortable being in the store since none of the employees wore a mask while I was in there. There were also customers without masks. I had on a mask but was asked to stand closer than I was comfortable with to answer questions.  I’m a senior at high risk for Covid and would appreciate if the staff would take that into consideration to protect all their customers, not just seniors.  I came to the store at the recommendation of another senior.  We all need to do our part to end this pandemic and save lives.

name: Michael Moore
text: Great, Quick, Friendly and affordable. Would recommend it to anyone! Go support a local business.

name: Brian Nunnelly
text: Tremendous repair shop! Very timely also very knowledgeable! Top of the line in my opinion! Highly recommend!!

name: Brandon Ritchey
text: Was quoted one price, called the next day and was told it would be an extra $20 for overnight shipping even though the day before was told it would also arrive the next day for repair. Ended up taking over a week to come in and so when I dropped it off I requested the extra fee be refunded. Guy took an attitude about it but agreed. When I picked it up the next day I asked if it had been refunded. The woman told me I was ridiculous and just handed me a $20 bill Extremely unprofessional.

resp.text:
Hi Brandon!!!
We did order your part for overnight delivery, unfortunately due to an error in FedEx system we did not receive it overnight. I do remember the conversation with you and did agree that it would be no issue to refund you the overnight shipping. We received the part and had it in your hands today as well as the refund. and after watching the tape I couldn't find a single instance where my employee called you ridiculous. But nonetheless, I apologize that you had an unpleasant experience and we look forward to helping you next time should the need arise. Have a great day!!

name: Warren Stroud
text: Laid back atmosphere.  Had 2 repair jobs completed here with zero issues. Fast service. Highly recommended

name: Adam Schwab
text: Has there hours for Saturday as open till 2pm. But when I get there at 12:00 there is no lights on door locked and closed!! Just wasteful and disrespectful to waste someone’s time, money and gas will not recommend nor try and go back again!!

resp.text: We are closed on Saturday....our door has the hours as well as Google. Sorry for the confusion.we are doing our best to help all in these trying times.

name: Miguel Cano Torres
text: This place is amazing. Good service, and very nice people straight forward with the point. 30-45 minutes and boom they are done. Very cheap too. 10/10 recommend.

name: Crystal Crump
text: Wow, blown away by the prices, friendly atmosphere and the professionalism. 100% recommend. Fast service and affordable, thanks y’all so much!

resp.text: No problem!!! Let is know if we can help with anything else!!

name: Anna Kennedy
text: Fast repair and friendly service! First replacement screen ended up being defective and thankfully I realized it before leaving. He put a second one on quickly and with no charge. All their repairs are warrantied which is great. It was also super convenient for them to be open on Saturdays which is the only day I could get down there. Would definitely recommend!

name: Ashley Blusiewicz
text: I love this place! There is no better place to do business when it comes to phones. Buy sell trade or even repairs. Best prices and customer service by far.i won't be doing business any where else from now on!

name: Tara Clements
text: I shattered the back of my phone a few days ago. My deductible with my phone carrier insurance was $200. Jonathan fixed it for me for $35! Awesome service and business!

name: Carla BOYD
text: Just left cell Repairs +. Had a great experience Got my battery replaced in my iPhone I was in and out in about 20 minutes great bunch of people didn’t try to sell me what I didn’t need I’m very well pleased!! I will be recommending cell repair + to my friends thanks so much Jon !!!

name: Blake nobles
text: I had a great experience,great customer service. This store was the only store to have my parts in stock. They had my phone fixed in 20 mins and they were the cheapest. I highly recommend CELL REPAIRS PLUS

name: Harper Lee
text:
Total scam. First you pay 40 dollars to get the phone evaluated which was not explained from the start, then another hundred for a potential repair not a guaranteed repair mind you! I should have just got a replacement from my phone company for a hundred. I was trying to get my contacts. What a waste of forty dollars time  and potentially wasting a total of
140 dollars with no guarantee! He must pay for reviews as he is not credible or honest! Unbelievable, he is still in business! Don’t trust anything he says or states! Go elsewhere,  anywhere but there! Trust me there are far more reputable honest folks that charge the right amount to start and either can or can not do the repair.

I am reporting him to better business bureau for his deception and dishonesty.

resp.text:
Miss Lee we wish you the best as we did on the phone the other day. We charge 40 $ to diagnose any device that comes in unresponsive, to cover our costs  and then apply that money towards the total cost of the repair if the customer chooses to do so. We explain that without fail every time we do a diagnostic. I apologize for any misunderstanding that you had with us in our initial conversation.

We take the word guarantee very seriously, and would never guarantee repair on a phone we haven't seen in months. That Miss Lee and that alone is why would not guarantee a repair. We do guarantee our repairs and most of all parts have a lifetime warranty. I'm sorry that you felt that this review was necessary as well as  the conversation and language you used with us on the phone the other day was necessary but we do sincerely wish you the best.

JF

name: Luis Palacios
text: Honestly hands down amazing work in record time. With unbeatable prices. They have fixed my phone on multiple occasions. Screen or battery have never been disappointed. I recommend them if you ever have any issues with any device.

name: Riley Norton
text: Best cell phone repair in the area! I have used this place twice and Jonathan is an extremely honest guy who is very professional. They have great customer service and are speedy with getting the job done! We are blessed to have such a great business in this area!

name: Chad
text: Went there for a small repair to my daughter's phone, wound up being a customer for life. Technician was polite and knowledgeable. He even talked directly to my teenage daughter, telling her some proper behavior to adopt in order to not have her issue again. Super impressed and happy.

resp.text: Thank you sooo much!!! It was my pleasure!

They are quick about it as well, having my system back up and running in only 3 days. They are very personable and friendly and don't charge an arm and a leg for their services. They are a small American business operation, and I will support them with my business the next time I have a computer issue. They beat the 'BIG' guys hands down!!! GREAT JOB Y'ALL!

text: Highly recommend. I got a custom built computer for my specific needs in editing. Holy cow, it was fast! I was able to edit in LR in a quarter of the time that it used to take me. They’re nice, relatable, friendly, great communication, great quality!

name: MaryBeth Winter
text: I had horrible luck and dropped my iMac, cracking the screen as I was unpacking from our move. PC Tech Computer Repair was the second place I called after a store in Enterprise, AL told me they were the closest place that repaired Apple Computers. The employees at PC Tech Repair displayed genuine customer service. They were kind, honest, fair, and repaired my computer in a timely manner. The screen they ordered to fix my computer was cracked worse than my original, they promptly called me and communicated that it would take longer to repair because they had to order an additional and have it shipped. I appreciated this communication so much!  Upon pick up, I came in with my 1 year old and the guy even helped to carry my repaired computer to my car! I will be using PC Tech Repair for any of my future tech needs and will definitely be recommending them to friends! Their customer service was phenomenal (which is what truly matters!)

name: Casey Cannon
text: I decided to go to PC Tech due to the positive feedback I saw on google reviews. I had an issue with my computer charge port so I dropped it off to get it diagnosed for repair. I was later told it was the DC jack needing replaced and the repair would cost 150.00. I was blown away at the price so I decided to think on it. Shawn told me the part alone cost 50 dollars. I told him I would rather look around for another computer and I would like to pick up my computer. He told me come on by and pick it up the following day. A few days later I decided to pull it apart and see how detailed the work was. As I took it apart I noticed there was no hard drive in it. I called Shawn as he proceeded to say that that happens sometimes and his kid must have forgot to put it back in when they were looking for the issue. Additionally I found the part on eBay new for less than 20 dolllars. Not to mention the fact that the diagnoses when they originally took it apart would have been an extra screw to replace the DC jack which he tried charging me another 100 bucks. All together a very bad experience and I would rather avoid this place at all cost.

resp.text:
sir we dont use ebay parts
sorry for the drive being left out
everybody makes mistakes
and the diagnoses you was informed about up front
u did not have to leave it'
sorry for ur inconvenience

text: We have just tried them for our first time. They seem knowledgeable and offered good service.

name: Nic Reagan
text: Took my dad’s computer in after he stuck a magnet to the side and damaged the hard drive. The computer contained years of family photos and PC Tech retrieved our photos and got us up and running again. All within 24 hours. Thanks!

resp.text: Thank u.   Glad we could assist u sir

name: Leslie Ann
text: I called to get an estimate. And they guy was being a total jerk on the phone. He said he had to see the laptop and such and I live like 45 mins away.I offered to give the model number he snapped at me and said no, no I will not. I had 2 others give me an estimate. Very rude person, glad I did not take my business here

resp.text:
Mam sorry u feel that way. All our calls are recorded and the tech was not rude. We dont give estimates on phone so we can give best price possible.  This will be sent to google for review on ur account.
Thanks for calling

name: Art Of Valor
text: Great training and educational experiences!

name: Catalina Irizarry
text: Although they were not able to help with my issue, the staff was more than happy to listen and give me ideas on how to proceed next.

name: Mercedes Ziegler
text: The best customer service I've ever received, and my old Macbook is working like new. Will definitely return if I have any other issues. Very affordable service as well!

name: Shirley Camp
text: Great 👍

name: Tye Campbell
text: Fantastic store. My friend took her Mac to a big store (you can probably guess which one), and they told her that her hard drive had melted. That sounded fishy to me so I took it to The Core, and the only thing wrong with it is that it needed the operating system reinstalled. Easy fix, and great service!

name: Takishia Tillman
text: They are the best!! My moms phone updated and her watch wouldn’t connect back to it , we took it to T-Mobile they couldn’t fix it so we contacted Apple and they wanted to schedule an appointment so I googled some places and saw this one we walked in the staff was beyond friendly they fixed it with no problem!!!! I I recommend this place to anyone!!!

name: Alexa Carlisle
text: FANTASTIC service! Chase has helped my husband and I several times. My computer completely died and I didn't think it could be fixed. He called and said he thought he could get it working again, and now it's as good as new! They have also advised me over the phone for no cost when I thought I had a virus. I definitely recommend using The Core for ANY Apple needs.

name: Amanda Hendrix
text: Let me tell you about The Core, you guys. They are dependable, knowledgable, and flat out rockstars! Our business uses them for all of our technology needs. We have team members all over the country and they have been more than gracious to support each of us. As we continue to grow, I hope that they will continue to grow. I honestly like working with them better than a corporate Apple location. Other big retailers are always crowded and take days, sometimes weeks to get help. The Core isn't just another retailer, they actually know their stuff. They are actually focused on helping people grow their businesses. If your business needs any sort of devices... The Core is the way to go.

name: Kelsey Watson
text: These people rock!!!! Best service I have had since I have been in Tuscaloosa! They really know what they are talking about and have been able to fix all the problems with my laptop I have thrown at them. Don't go anywhere else! (especially not the ferg for you college students)

name: Julie Reed
text: I can't say enough good things about The Core.  The staff is very knowledgable and friendly.  They go the extra mile to help you.  Rob is wonderful.  He spent a lot of time helping me with my problem and was patient and friendly the whole time.  They have always had the products that I needed and could always identify what I needed when I really didn't know what is was called. I will always go to The Core for all of my Apple needs.

name: Elizabeth Monk
text:
So helpful, friendly, professional, and knowledgeable. I bought my computer here, and had an excellent experience here.

Highly recommended!

name: Michelle johnson
text:
I went there for them to help unlock
An I pad my granddaughter locked
They were GREAT and so helpful
I will go there with all my apple products.  If you have a problem with any I pads or phones or computer I suggest you contact them
Now my granddaughter has her I pad and can watch her videos and listen to music and play her games
Thank you for your hel

name: Elliott Salls
text: Took over 3 days to diagnose the problem. When diagnosed, I was told Apple had risen the price of Hard Drive power cables and that I needed a new Hard Drive and the anticipated cost would exceed $300. I was never contacted by The Core and I made every phone call to receive information regarding MY Mac Book. SLOW, SLOW, SLOW...they're there to expedite the process, not slow it down. After being told 3x's that my Hard Drive power cable would arrive the "next day", I was fed up with the process and proceeded to take my Mac Book to the University Supe Store, Apple Store (located in the Ferguson Center, at The University of Alabama)...and it was fixed in less than 4hours. Oh yea, and the final cost was only $40 for a new Hard Drive power cable and the installation. The actual Hard Drive was discovered...sorry The Core you're Apple privileges should be revoked strictly on your customer service, not to mention your "knowledge" of Apple products.

name: Jay Hamilton
text: I'm not saying that their actual service in person is lacking. I've actually heard great things about their store. However, I tried on multiple occassions to call them, and email them, and I couldn't get a response. I couldn't find time in my schedule to actually drive to their store, so this was pretty frustrating  I ended up taking my iMac issues to the SupeStore on UA's campus and they fixed my hard drive in a day.

name: Margaret Teare
text:
Great staff with incredible knowledge! Don't buy your equipment ANYWHERE else whether you are a company or an individual in West Alabama. Buying printers, computers, including Mac related products at their subsidiary, The Core, costs the same as buying at Best Buy, Staples, The Iphone Clinic, except you get to avoid set up problems, software and hardware conflicts and unnecessary downtime.

Its owner, Tuscom, AND The Core, is THE ONLY CERTIFIED Mac Reseller and SERVICE PROVIDER, in Tuscaloosa and Northport. Do not take your iPhone, iPad, Macbook Pro, Macbook Air to anyone else because if that company messes up your equipment a certified service provider CANNOT fix it legally. Just because the company has Iphone or Mac in its name, does mean that company is legally allowed to work on Mac products. Don't be fooled!

They troubleshot my Mac (for free) and uploaded my software and files to my new Mac for the same price as buying the computer. As my business grows, I will buy EVERYTHING from them. Run, don't walk, and sign up with these guys if you own a business, small or big. You will save so much money and headaches as you grow.   The employees will NEVER sell you anything you don't need AND will answer any question you have, whether, you are a tech newbie or a pro, in language that mirrors your level of knowledge. That kind of integrity is priceless.

Rob is great!

name: Jake William
text: great staff and workers always friendly to me
